languages.text: "Магос, вы... уверены в том, что этот Номос не является анафемой, подлежащей немедленному уничтожению? Создание из когитатора, обуявшее мобильную машину... только ваше одобрение удерживает меня от поспешных действий".

"Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."
languages.original_text: "Магос, вы... уверены в том, что этот Номос не является анафемой, подлежащей немедленному уничтожению? Создание из когитатора, обуявшее мобильную машину... только ваше одобрение удерживает меня от поспешных действий".

traits.locale_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “贤者，你真的确定……这个叫‘诺莫斯’的家伙并不是需要立即毁灭的可憎之物吗？一只来自沉思者的生物，占据了一台有行动能力机器……我没有立即采取行动，仅仅是因为没有得到你的同意。”
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: “贤者，你真的确定……这个叫‘诺莫斯’的家伙并不是需要立即毁灭的可憎之物吗？一只来自思考器的生物，占据了一台有行动能力机器……我没有立即采取行动，仅仅是因为没有得到你的同意。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Magos, êtes-vous bien... certain que ce Nomos n'est pas une abomination ? Et qu'il ne faut pas la détruire sur-le-champ ? Une machine mobile contrôlée par une créature issue d'un cogitateur... Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire pour que je prenne des mesures immédiates. »
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: « Magos, êtes-vous bien... certain que ce Nomos n'est pas une abomination ? Et qu'il ne faut pas la détruire sur-le-champ ? Une machine mobile contrôlée par une créature issue d'un cogitateur... Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire pour que je prenne des mesures immédiates. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Magos, ¿está... seguro de que el tal Nomos no es una abominación que exija la destrucción inmediata? Una criatura salida de un cogitador que se ha apoderado de una máquina móvil... Solo la falta de autorización por su parte evita que actúe de forma inmediata».
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: «Magos, ¿está... seguro de que el tal Nomos no es una abominación que exija la destrucción inmediata? Una criatura salida de un cogitador que se ha apoderado de una máquina móvil... Solo la falta de autorización por su parte evita que actúe de forma inmediata».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「マゴス、この…ノモスは即破壊すべき忌まわしきものではないという、確信があるのか？考算機が移動式機械を継承したクリーチャーを生むとは…俺がただちに行動を起こしていない唯一の理由は、お前の承認がないからだ」
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: 「マゴス、この…ノモスは即破壊すべき忌まわしきものではないという、確信があるのか？考算機が移動式機械を継承したクリーチャーを生むとは…俺がただちに行動を起こしていない唯一の理由は、お前の承認がないからだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Magos, seid Ihr ... sicher, dass dieser Nomos keine Abscheulichkeit ist, die augenblicklich zerstört gehört? Eine Kreatur aus einem Cogitator, die eine mobile Maschine übernommen hat ... Allein die Abwesenheit Eurer Zustimmung hindert mich daran, augenblicklich zur Tat zu schreiten."
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: "Magos, seid Ihr ... sicher, dass dieser Nomos keine Abscheulichkeit ist, die augenblicklich zerstört gehört? Eine Kreatur aus einem Cogitator, die eine mobile Maschine übernommen hat ... Allein die Abwesenheit Eurer Zustimmung hindert mich daran, augenblicklich zur Tat zu schreiten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

languages.text: "Magos... Bu Nomos'un derhâl imha edilmesi gereken bir garabet olmadığına emin misin? Mobil makineyi kontrolü altına almış bir kavramsayardan gelme bir yaratık... Derhâl müdahale etmemi engelleyen tek şey, senin onay vermemiş olman."
languages.original_text: "Magos, are you... certain that this Nomos is not an abomination that requires immediate destruction? A creature from a cogitator that has taken over a mobile machine... It is only the absence of your approval that is stopping me from taking immediate action."

traits.locale_text: "Magos... Bu Nomos'un derhâl imha edilmesi gereken bir garabet olmadığına emin misin? Mobil makineyi kontrolü altına almış bir kavramsayardan gelme bir yaratık... Derhâl müdahale etmemi engelleyen tek şey senin onay vermemiş olman."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
